content:
In the south, the forces of defense were destroyed by two radio electronic struggle stations, 112 invaders and 27 units of weapons and military equipment of the enemy.

About thisreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

"The defense forces continue to cause fire damage to the locations of the enemy, firing positions and rear," the message said.

During the day in the Orikhiv and Kherson directions, the defenders eliminated 112 invaders, 8 artillery systems, 2 anti-aircraft missile complexes and 15 units of auto-bronetant and special equipment.

Recall Russian invadersmadeFour storms in the operating area of the South Defense forces.
title: The Armed Forces in the south destroyed 112 invaders, 8 artisystems and 2 SPRs
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. “Defense forces continue to cause fire ...
author: Army Inform
